titleStmt.title: A letter from Rome written by a Roman Catholick there, to a person of quality in England; giving a full account of a memorial presented to the Pope, in relation to the late King James's affairs with the Popes answer, or, (rather) denyal thereto. Licensed, July 2d: 1689.

notesStmt.note: Dated at end: Rome, June 1: V.S. 1689.
Reproduction of original in the Newberry Library.
